title: GET_ENTITY_HEIGHT_ABOVE_GROUND
content:
0x1DD55701034110E50x57F56A4D// GetEntityHeightAboveGround
float GET_ENTITY_HEIGHT_ABOVE_GROUND(Entity entity);Return height (z-dimension) above ground.   
Example: The pilot in a titan plane is 1.844176 above ground.  
How can i convert it to meters?  
Everything seems to be in meters, probably this too.
codeBlocks:
Return height (z-dimension) above ground.   
Example: The pilot in a titan plane is 1.844176 above ground.  
How can i convert it to meters?  
Everything seems to be in meters, probably this too.

local entity = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_ENTITY_HEIGHT_ABOVE_GROUND
GetEntityHeightAboveGround(entity)
